sources.title: Paracetamol 500mg SPC (Public)
sources.text: Indicated for mild to moderate pain and fever. Do not exceed 4g/day in adults.

sources.title: Omeprazole 20mg SPC (Public)
sources.text: Reduces gastric acid secretion by inhibition of the H+/K+ ATPase enzyme system.

sources.title: Azithromycin 500mg SPC (Public)
sources.text: Macrolide antibiotic indicated for susceptible infections. No claim of mortality reduction without comparative studies.
